channel.title: 2011 on East Back Corporation
channel.description: Recent content in 2011 on East Back Corporation

item.title: Sponsored as RubyWorld Conference 2011 sponsor
item.description: As a silver sponsor, “RubyWorld Conference 2011” will be held on September 5 (Mon.) and 6 (Tue.), 2011 at Shimane Prefectural Industrial Exchange Center “Kunibiki Messe”.

item.title: Commissioned the operation of Ruby Camp 2011 summer from Shimane
item.description: On May 13, 2011, we commissioned the operation of Ruby Camp 2011 summer from Shimane Prefecture. The Ruby camp has been hosted by Shimane Prefecture since 2008, and this is the fourth year this year.

item.title: Head office relocation
item.description: On April 1, 2011, the head office was relocated as follows. ã€’690-0816 1st Kitahyocho, Matsue City, Shimane Prefecture Techno Arc Shimane 3F

item.title: East Buck Co., Ltd. Business Plan Contest Winner
item.description: Eland auction “Do-me-a-favor” that Toru Kurahashi applied for at the “Matsue Open Source Utilization Business Plan Contest 2011” sponsored by the Matsue City Shimane Open Source Software Association.
